I cannot copy this to a DVD correctly.  When I do, it failed with Nero, and when I used DVD Fab 6 it finished, but it won't work in any of my players.  I used a Magnavox Blue-Ray Player, 2 different computers DVD Players, a XBOX 360 and the HD addon unit, and a PS3.  Nothing would read it.  I have this happen on a LOT of 2 Lions stuff.  What am I doing wrong?
